posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Taylor
I have the following SGC graded T-205s for sale:

SGC 10 Collins (Mouth Open) - $150 OBO

Postage is included in the above quoted price.  Scans are available upon request.  First email or post to say 'I'll take it' gets the card.  Payment may be made via PayPal (add 3% to total for fees), personal check or money order.  Thanks for looking.

Posted By: Mike Taylor
BUMP!  I am also willing to listen to trade offers for other SGC graded T-205s or raw T-206s.

Posted By: Mike Taylor
BUMP for subtraction of cards dealt away and price drop/ BO for the Collins.

Posted By: Mike Taylor
The Collins has been traded away and is no longer available.  Thanks for all the interest.
